verses.roman:
tabe vakreśvare prabhu kahilā nācite
vakreśvara nāce, prabhu lāgilā gāite

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; vakreśvare—unto Vakreśvara Paṇḍita; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahilā—ordered; nācite—to dance; vakreśvara nāce—Vakreśvara Paṇḍita began to dance; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lāgilā—began; gāite—to sing.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then ordered Vakreśvara Paṇḍita to dance, and as he began to dance, the Lord began to sing.
